verses.verse: Now it came to pass<WH139>, when Adoni–zedek king<WH4428> of Jerusalem<WH3389> had heard<WH8085> how<WH3588> Joshua<WH3091> had taken<WH3920> Ai<WH5857>, and had utterly destroyed<WH2763> it<WH6213>; as he had done to Jericho<WH3405> and her king<WH4428>, so he had done<WH6213> to Ai<WH5857> and her king<WH4428>; and how the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gibeon<WH1391> had made peace<WH7999> with Israel<WH3478>, and were among them<WH7130>;

That they feared<WH3372> greatly<WH3966>, because Gibeon<WH1391> was a great<WH1419> city<WH5892>, as one<WH259> of the royal<WH4467> cities<WH5892>, and because it was greater<WH1419> than Ai<WH5857>, and all the men<WH582> there were mighty<WH1368>.

Why Adoni<WH139>–zedek king<WH4428> of Jerusalem<WH3389> sent<WH7971> unto Hoham<WH1944> king<WH4428> of Hebron<WH2275>, and unto Piram<WH6502> king<WH4428> of Jarmuth<WH3412>, and unto Japhia<WH3309> king<WH4428> of Lachish<WH3923>, and unto Debir<WH1688> king<WH4428> of Eglon<WH5700>, saying<WH559>,
Come up<WH5927> unto me<WH5826>, and help me<WH5221>, that we may strike Gibeon<WH1391>: for it has made peace<WH7999> with Joshua<WH3091> and with the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

Therefore the five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, the king<WH4428> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, the king<WH4428> of Hebron<WH2275>, the king<WH4428> of Jarmuth<WH3412>, the king<WH4428> of Lachish<WH3923>, the king<WH4428> of Eglon<WH5700>, gathered themselves together<WH622>, and went up<WH5927>, they and all their hosts<WH4264>, and encamped<WH2583> before Gibeon<WH1391>, and made war against it<WH3898>.

And the men<WH582> of Gibeon<WH1391> sent<WH7971> unto Joshua<WH3091> to the camp<WH4264> to Gilgal<WH1537>, saying<WH559>, Remove<WH7503> not your hand<WH3027> from your servants<WH5650>; come up<WH5927> to us quickly<WH4120>, and save<WH3467> us<WH5826>, and help us<WH4428>: for all the kings of the Amorites<WH567> that live<WH3427> in the mountains<WH2022> are gathered together against us<WH6908>.
So Joshua<WH3091> ascended<WH5927> from Gilgal<WH1537>, he<WH5971>, and all the people of war<WH4421> with him<WH1368>, and all the mighty men of valor<WH2428>.

And the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Joshua<WH3091>, Fear<WH3372> them not<WH5414>: for I have delivered them into your hand<WH3027>; there shall not a man<WH376> of them stand<WH5975> before you<WH6440>.
Joshua<WH3091> therefore came<WH935> unto them suddenly<WH6597>, and went up<WH5927> from Gilgal<WH1537> all night<WH3915>.

And the Lord<WH3068> defeated<WH2000> them before<WH6440> Israel<WH3478>, and killed<WH5221> them with a great<WH1419> slaughter<WH4347> at Gibeon<WH1391>, and chased<WH7291> them along the way<WH1870> that goes up<WH4608> to Beth<WH1032>–horon, and struck<WH5221> them to Azekah<WH5825>, and unto Makkedah<WH4719>.

And it came to pass<WH5127>, as they fled from before<WH6440> Israel<WH3478>, and were in the going down<WH4174> to Beth<WH1032>–horon, that the Lord<WH3068> cast down<WH7993> great<WH1419> stones<WH68> from heaven<WH8064> upon them unto Azekah<WH5825>, and they died<WH4191>: they were more<WH7227> which died<WH4191> with hailstones<WH1259> than they whom<WH834> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> killed<WH2026> with the sword<WH2719>.

Then spoke<WH1696> Joshua<WH3091> to the Lord<WH3068> in the day<WH3117> when the Lord<WH3068> delivered up<WH5414> the Amorites<WH567> before<WH6440> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and he said<WH559> in the sight<WH5869> of Israel<WH3478>, Sun<WH8121>, stand you still<WH1826> upon Gibeon<WH1391>; and you<WH3394>, Moon, in the valley<WH6010> of Ajalon<WH357>.

And the sun<WH8121> stood still<WH1826>, and the moon<WH3394> stayed<WH5975>, until the people<WH1471> had avenged<WH5358> themselves upon their enemies<WH341>. Is not this<WH1931> written<WH3789> in the book<WH5612> of Jasher<WH3477>? So the sun<WH8121> stood still<WH5975> in the middle<WH2677> of heaven<WH8064>, and hurried<WH213> not to go down<WH935> about a whole<WH8549> day<WH3117>.

And there was no day<WH3117> like that before<WH6440> it or after<WH310> it<WH3068>, that the Lord listened<WH8085> unto the voice<WH6963> of a man<WH376>: for the Lord<WH3068> fought<WH3898> for Israel<WH3478>.
And Joshua<WH3091> returned<WH7725>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him<WH4264>, unto the camp to Gilgal<WH1537>.
But these five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> fled<WH5127>, and hid<WH2244> themselves in a cave<WH4631> at Makkedah<WH4719>.
And it was told<WH5046> Joshua<WH3091>, saying<WH559>, The five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> are found<WH4672> hid<WH2244> in a cave<WH4631> at Makkedah<WH4719>.
And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559>, Roll<WH1556> great<WH1419> stones<WH68> upon the mouth<WH6310> of the cave<WH4631>, and set<WH6485> men<WH582> by it for to keep them<WH8104>:

And stay<WH5975> you not<WH7291>, but pursue after<WH310> your enemies<WH341>, and strike at the rear<WH2179> of them<WH5414>; allow them not to enter<WH935> into their cities<WH5892>: for the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has delivered<WH5414> them into your hand<WH3027>.

And it came to pass<WH3091>, when Joshua and the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> had made an end<WH3615> of slaying<WH5221> them with a very<WH3966> great<WH1419> slaughter<WH4347>, until they were consumed<WH8552>, that the rest<WH8300> which remained<WH8277> of them entered<WH935> into fenced<WH4013> cities<WH5892>.

And all the people<WH5971> returned<WH7725> to the camp<WH4264> to Joshua<WH3091> at Makkedah<WH4719> in peace<WH7965>: none moved<WH2782> his tongue<WH3956> against any<WH376> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.
Then said<WH559> Joshua<WH3091>, Open<WH6605> the mouth<WH6310> of the cave<WH4631>, and bring out<WH3318> those five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> unto me out of the cave<WH4631>.

And they did<WH6213> so<WH3318>, and brought forth those five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> unto him out of the cave<WH4631>, the king<WH4428> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, the king<WH4428> of Hebron<WH2275>, the king<WH4428> of Jarmuth<WH3412>, the king<WH4428> of Lachish<WH3923>, and the king<WH4428> of Eglon<WH5700>.

And it came to pass<WH3318>, when they brought out those kings<WH4428> unto Joshua<WH3091>, that Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> for all the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478>, and said<WH559> unto the captains<WH7101> of the men<WH582> of war<WH4421> which went<WH1980> with him<WH7126>, Come near, put<WH7760> your feet<WH7272> upon the necks<WH6677> of these kings<WH4428>. And they came near<WH7126>, and put<WH7760> their feet<WH7272> upon the necks of them<WH6677>.

And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> unto them<WH3372>, Fear not<WH2865>, nor be dismayed, be strong<WH2388> and of good courage<WH553>: for thus shall the Lord<WH3068> do<WH6213> to all your enemies<WH341> against whom you fight<WH3898>.

And afterward<WH310> Joshua<WH3091> struck<WH5221> them<WH4191>, and killed them<WH8518>, and hanged them on five<WH2568> trees<WH6086>: and they were hanging<WH8518> upon the trees<WH6086> until the evening<WH6153>.

And it came to pass at the time<WH6256> of the going down<WH935> of the sun<WH8121>, that Joshua<WH3091> commanded<WH6680>, and they took them down<WH3381> off the trees<WH6086>, and cast<WH7993> them into the cave<WH4631> where they had been hid<WH2244>, and laid<WH7760> great<WH1419> stones<WH68> in the cave<WH4631>'s mouth<WH6310>, which remain until this very<WH6106> day<WH3117>.

And that day<WH3117> Joshua<WH3091> took<WH3920> Makkedah<WH4719>, and struck<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and the king<WH4428> there he utterly destroyed<WH2763>, them<WH5315>, and all the souls that were in it<WH7604>; he let none remain<WH8300>: and he did<WH6213> to the king<WH4428> of Makkedah<WH4719> as he did<WH6213> unto the king<WH4428> of Jericho<WH3405>.
Then Joshua<WH3091> passed<WH5674> from Makkedah<WH4719>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him<WH3841>, unto Libnah, and fought<WH3898> against Libnah<WH3841>:

And the Lord<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> it also<WH4428>, and the king there<WH3027>, into the hand of Israel<WH3478>; and he struck<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and all the souls<WH5315> that were in it<WH7604>; he let none remain<WH8300> in it<WH6213>; but did unto the king<WH4428> there as he did<WH6213> unto the king<WH4428> of Jericho<WH3405>.
And Joshua<WH3091> passed<WH5674> from Libnah<WH3841>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him<WH3923>, unto Lachish, and encamped<WH2583> against it<WH3898>, and fought against it:

And the Lord<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> Lachish<WH3923> into the hand<WH3027> of Israel<WH3478>, which took<WH3920> it on the second<WH8145> day<WH3117>, and struck<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and all the souls<WH5315> that were in it<WH6213>, according to all that he had done to Libnah<WH3841>.

Then Horam<WH2036> king<WH4428> of Gezer<WH1507> came up<WH5927> to help<WH5826> Lachish<WH3923>; and Joshua<WH3091> struck<WH5221> him and his people<WH5971>, until he had left<WH7604> him none remaining<WH8300>.
And from Lachish<WH3923> Joshua<WH3091> passed<WH5674> unto Eglon<WH5700>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him<WH2583>; and they encamped against it<WH3898>, and fought against it:

And they took<WH3920> it on that day<WH3117>, and struck<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and all the souls<WH5315> that were in it he utterly destroyed<WH2763> that day<WH3117>, according to all that he had done<WH6213> to Lachish<WH3923>.
And Joshua<WH3091> went up<WH5927> from Eglon<WH5700>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him<WH2275>, unto Hebron; and they fought against it<WH3898>:

And they took<WH3920> it<WH5221>, and struck it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and the king<WH4428> there<WH5892>, and all the cities there<WH5315>, and all the souls that were in it<WH7604>; he left none remaining<WH8300>, according to all that he had done<WH6213> to Eglon<WH5700>; but destroyed<WH2763> it utterly<WH5315>, and all the souls that were in it.
And Joshua<WH3091> returned<WH7725>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him<WH1688>, to Debir; and fought against it<WH3898>:

And he took<WH3920> it<WH4428>, and the king there<WH5892>, and all the cities there<WH5221>; and they struck them with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and utterly destroyed<WH2763> all the souls<WH5315> that were in it<WH7604>; he left none remaining<WH8300>: as he had done<WH6213> to Hebron<WH2275>, so he did<WH6213> to Debir<WH1688>, and to the king<WH4428> there<WH6213>; as he had done also to Libnah<WH3841>, and to her king<WH4428>.

So Joshua<WH3091> struck<WH5221> all the country<WH776> of the hills<WH2022>, and of the south<WH5045>, and of the valley<WH8219>, and of the springs<WH794>, and all their kings<WH4428>: he left<WH7604> none remaining<WH8300>, but utterly destroyed<WH2763> all that breathed<WH5397>, as the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> commanded<WH6680>.
And Joshua<WH3091> struck<WH5221> them from Kadesh<WH6947>–barnea even unto Gaza<WH5804>, and all the country<WH776> of Goshen<WH1657>, even unto Gibeon<WH1391>.
And all these kings<WH4428> and their land<WH776> did Joshua<WH3091> take<WH3920> at one<WH259> time<WH6471>, because the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> fought<WH3898> for Israel<WH3478>.
And Joshua<WH3091> returned<WH7725>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him<WH4264>, unto the camp to Gilgal<WH1537>.
